innerText: (15) 5. Samāpattivaggo

children.innerText: . ''Dvme
, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Samāpattiksalatā ca samāpatttivuṭṭhānakusalatā ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā''ti.

innerText: 164 . ''Dvme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Samāpattiksalatā ca samāpatttivuṭṭhānakusalatā ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā''ti.

children.innerText: . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Ajjavañca maddavañca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

innerText: 165 . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Ajjavañca maddavañca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? I'm worried about soracca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

innerText: 166 . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? I'm worried about soracca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Sākhalyañca paṭisanthāro ca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

innerText: 167 . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Sākhalyañca paṭisanthāro ca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

children.innerText: . 'Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Avihiṃsā ca soceyyañca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā''.

innerText: 168 . 'Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Avihiṃsā ca soceyyañca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Indriyesu aguttadvāratā ca bhojane amattaññutā ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā''.

innerText: 169 . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Indriyesu aguttadvāratā ca bhojane amattaññutā ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dvme
, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Indriyesu guttadvāratā ca bhojane mattaññutā ca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

innerText: 170 . ''Dvme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Indriyesu guttadvāratā ca bhojane mattaññutā ca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dvme
, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Paṭisaṅkhānabalaṇca bhāvanābalaṇca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

innerText: 171 . ''Dvme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Paṭisaṅkhānabalaṇca bhāvanābalaṇca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Satibalaṇca samādhibalaṇca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

innerText: 172 . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Satibalaṇca samādhibalaṇca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dvme
, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Sametho
ca vipassanā ca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

innerText: 173 . ''Dvme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Samethoca vipassanā ca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Sīlavipatti ca diṭṭhivipatti ca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

innerText: 174 . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Sīlavipatti ca diṭṭhivipatti ca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Sīlasampadā ca diṭṭhisampadā ca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

innerText: 175 . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Sīlasampadā ca diṭṭhisampadā ca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Sīlavisuddhi ca diṭṭhivisuddhi ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā''.

innerText: 176 . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Sīlavisuddhi ca diṭṭhivisuddhi ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Diṭṭhivisuddhi ca yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānaṃ. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

innerText: 177 . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Diṭṭhivisuddhi ca yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānaṃ. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Asantuṭṭhitā ca kusalesu dhammesu, appaṭivānitā ca padhānasmiṃ. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

innerText: 178 . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Asantuṭṭhitā ca kusalesu dhammesu, appaṭivānitā ca padhānasmiṃ. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Muṭṭhassaccañca asampajaññañca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

innerText: 179 . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Muṭṭhassaccañca asampajaññañca. Eat me, bhikkhave, the two dhammā''.

children.innerText: . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Sati ca sampajañañañaca
, I eat you, bhikkhave, you have two dhammā''ti.

innerText: 180 . ''Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā. Katame dve? Sati ca sampajañañañaca, I eat you, bhikkhave, you have two dhammā''ti.
Samāpattivaggo pañcamo.
Tatiyo paṇṇāsako samatto.
